replies.body: That's definitely not cool or okay at all. If you were able to report him in the post game lobby, excellent. If you couldn't but you still have screenshots of what he was saying, send that over to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can take a look.
